TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定当用户按下某个键时构成的字符。A specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key. 例如, 当用户按下 SHIFT + K 时, 属性将返回一个大写的 K。For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the property returns an uppercase K. 当用户按下某个键时, 将发生事件。A event occurs when the user presses a key. 与事件密切相关的两个事件为和。Two events that are closely related to the event are and . 当用户按下某个键时,事件位于每个事件的前面, 当用户释放某个键时, 将发生事件。The event precedes each event when the user presses a key, and a event occurs when the user releases a key. 当用户按下某个键时, 重复 , 每次重复该字符时, 都会发生事件。When the user holds down a key, duplicate and events occur each time the character repeats. 发布时, 将生成一个事件。One event is generated upon release. 对于每个事件 , 都传递。With each event, a is passed. 通过每个 和事件传递。 A is passed with each and event. 指定是否将任何修改键 (CTRL、SHIFT 或 ALT) 与另一个键一起使用。A specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key. (也可以通过 类的属性获取此修饰符信息。)(This modifier information can also be obtained through the property of the class.) 设置为`true`可取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. 这会使控件不会按下键进行处理。This keeps the control from processing the key press. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件将在上处理某些关键笔画。Some controls will process certain key strokes on . 例如, 在调用之前处理 Enter 键。For example, processes the Enter key before is called. 在这种情况下, 不能取消事件, 而必须取消中的键笔划。In such cases, you cannot cancel the event, and must cancel the key stroke from instead. 有关事件模型的信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在按下键时对键进行计数, 并在每次按键后显示结果。The following example illustrates using the to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press. 然后, 将设置为 true, 以防止操作系统进一步处理该键。 is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key. 该示例假设有一个放置在该窗体上的窗体。The example assumes a form with a placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 必须创建此类的新实例。You must create a new instance of this class. 还必须设置事件处理程序。You must also set the event handler. 可以在类的构造函数中执行此操作。You can do this in the constructor for your class. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 当在控件中引发指定的事件时, 将调用附加的方法, 并且应用程序可以执行代码以响应事件。When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可获取修改键的当前状态。Use the property to get the current state of the modifier keys. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了一个消息框, 其中显示了 SHIFT 键的当前状态。The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

value.span: 如果处理过事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未处理该事件, 则会将其发送到操作系统进行默认处理。If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing. 设置为`true`可取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed` 方法使用属性来检查是否按下了 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed. 如果按 ENTER 键, 则将属性设置为`true`, 这表示处理事件。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与按下的键对应的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
The ASCII character that is composed.

value.span: 例如，如果用户按下 Shift + K，则该属性返回一个大写的 K。

span.span: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性在运行时采样击键, 并在特殊运行时条件下修改击键。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances. 例如, 你可以使用在用户输入邮政编码时禁用非数值 keypresses, 将数据输入字段中的所有字母都更改为大写, 或监视键盘或其他密钥输入设备的特定组合键。For example, you can use to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations. 可以获取或设置以下项:You can get or set the following keys: - a-z、a-z。a-z, A-Z. - CTRL.CTRL. - 标点符号。Punctuation marks. - 数字键, 都在键盘顶部和数字键盘上。Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad. - 回车.ENTER. 无法获取或设置以下项:You cannot get or set the following keys: - TAB 键。The TAB key. - 插入和删除。INSERT and DELETE. - 回家.HOME. - 端面.END. - PAGE UP 和 PAGE DOWN。PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN. - F1-F2。F1-F2. - 替代.ALT. - 箭头键。Arrow keys. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何检测以上提到的任何非字符密钥的信息, 请参阅类。For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed` 方法使用属性来检查是否按下了 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key pressed. 如果按 ENTER 键, 则将属性设置为`true`, 这表示处理事件。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]
